title: WCAS MENA 390-3-20 Advanced Topics in Middle East & North African Studies

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course will explore media, culture, and politics in Iran since 1979. We will focus on media (TV and Radio, Internet, music, cinema, cartons, Satire, and the press) to analyze the state and societal relations in Iran today. The main questions that we will answer during this course are: How has the political regime used the media to propagate its ideology, control the society, and shape the "ideal citizen"? To what extent has the state been successful in their efforts? How have the people used the media, especially social media, to ignore, undermine, and challenge the state authority?
